alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Outagamie; Portage; Shawano; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:58AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, Portage, Marathon, northern Winnebago, northern Waushara, Waupaca, western Outagamie and Shawano Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 457 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Marathon, Wood and Portage counties, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Appleton, Wausau, Stevens Point, Wisconsin Rapids, Shawano, Waupaca, Marshfield, Menasha, Weston and New London. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized urban flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Marathon; Outagamie; Portage; Shawano; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood
